snippet: The Journal News in White Plains, which drew anger after naming handgun permit holders in two New York counties, received a large amount of negative correspondence, a police report said.
abstract: Journal News, newspaper based in White Plains, NY, hires armed guards after outcry over its publication of online map of handgun permit holders living in Westchester and Rockland Counties following Newton, Conn  massacre; Journal News officials pledge to forge ahead with plans to expand the permit map to include Putnam, and local officials there have vowed to block the records' release.
lead_paragraph: The Journal News in White Plains, which drew anger after naming handgun permit holders in two New York counties, received a large amount of negative correspondence, a police report said.

headline.seo: Journal News Hires Armed Guards After Outcry Over Map of Gun Permit Holders
headline.main: Newspaper That Put Gun Permit Map Online Hires Armed Guards
headline.print_headline: Newspaper That Put Gun Permit Map Online Hires Armed Guards
